skill.name: market-research-reports
skill.description: Generate comprehensive market research reports (50+ pages) in the style of top consulting firms (McKinsey, BCG, Gartner). Features professional LaTeX formatting, extensive visual generation with scientific-schematics and generate-image, deep integration with research-lookup for data gathering, and multi-framework strategic analysis including Porter Five Forces, PESTLE, SWOT, TAM/SAM/SOM, and BCG Matrix.

security_audit.summary: All 527 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The scanner misinterpreted business terminology (SAM=Serviceable Addressable Market), LaTeX commands as cryptographic algorithms, markdown code blocks as shell commands, and standard file paths as path traversal. The only subprocess.run call uses hardcoded arguments to invoke sibling skills with no injection risk.

content.value_statement: Create comprehensive 50+ page market research reports with professional LaTeX formatting. Generate strategic visuals, perform multi-framework analysis, and produce consulting-quality deliverables for business decisions.
actual_capabilities: Generate 50+ page professional market research reports in LaTeX/PDF format
Create 6-28 strategic visuals using scientific-schematics and generate-image skills
Perform multi-framework analysis including Porter Five Forces, PESTLE, SWOT, and BCG Matrix
Calculate and visualize TAM/SAM/SOM market sizing with concentric circle diagrams
Produce risk heatmaps, competitive positioning matrices, and executive summary infographics
limitations: Requires scientific-schematics and generate-image skills for visual generation
Report compilation requires LaTeX distribution (pdflatex) installed on system
Visual generation adds processing time based on number of diagrams requested
Market data must be provided or sourced via research-lookup skill integration

use_cases.title: Investment Due Diligence Reports
use_cases.description: Produce comprehensive market analysis for investment decisions with competitive landscape and risk assessment.

use_cases.title: Client Presentation Materials
use_cases.description: Generate consulting-quality deliverables with professional formatting and strategic framework analysis.

use_cases.title: Market Entry Strategy Documents
use_cases.description: Create detailed market sizing and opportunity analysis for new market entry decisions.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Market Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a market research report about the {industry} market. Include TAM/SAM/SOM analysis, competitive landscape, and strategic recommendations.

prompt_templates.title: Full Strategic Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive 50+ page market research report on {topic}. Include Porter's Five Forces, PESTLE analysis, SWOT assessment, and BCG Matrix positioning. Generate all core visuals.

prompt_templates.title: Investment Focus Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate an investment-focused market research report for the {sector} industry. Include risk assessment, growth projections, competitive dynamics, and implementation roadmap.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Market Comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare the {market1} and {market2} markets in a comprehensive report. Include market sizing, growth rates, regulatory environment, and strategic recommendations for market entry.

output_examples.input: Generate a market research report on the electric vehicle charging infrastructure market in Europe.
output: Porter's Five Forces analysis with competitive dynamics
Risk heatmap with regulatory and market risks

output_examples.input: Create a comprehensive AI healthcare market report with all extended visuals.
output: Full market research document with 27+ visualizations
PESTLE analysis covering regulatory, social, and technological factors
Customer journey map and technology roadmap
Competitive positioning matrix with major players

best_practices: Start with core visuals (market growth, TAM/SAM/SOM, Five Forces) before generating additional diagrams
Use the --all flag only when comprehensive coverage is needed to save processing time
Provide specific market topics with industry context for more accurate visual prompts
anti_patterns: Requesting reports without specifying a clear market or industry focus
Generating all extended visuals without reviewing core analysis first
Using vague prompts like 'generate a report about technology' without market definition

faq.question: What skills are required for visual generation?
faq.answer: scientific-schematics and generate-image skills must be available for visual generation.

faq.question: Can I customize the report structure?
faq.answer: Yes, modify the LaTeX template or adjust prompts to focus on specific sections.

faq.question: How long does visual generation take?
faq.answer: Core visuals take 2-5 minutes; full 27 visuals may take 10-15 minutes.

faq.question: What output formats are supported?
faq.answer: Primary output is LaTeX compiled to PDF; figures are generated as PNG images.

faq.question: Can I skip visual generation?
faq.answer: Yes, generate the report text first and add visuals incrementally as needed.

faq.question: How are market projections calculated?
faq.answer: Provide your data or use research-lookup for sources; the skill generates visualization.
